creature.name: amazoness archer
creature.description: You see an amazoness archer. She handles her bow quite well and her arrows are very dangerous when she shoots them at you out of the forest!

creature.name: amazoness archer commander
creature.description: You see an amazoness archer commander. She is the leader of amazoness archers. Her bow skills are incredible and her arrows pierce everything.

creature.name: amazoness bodyguard
creature.description: You see an amazoness bodyguard who will guarantee the safety to the people of Amazon island.

creature.name: amazoness coastguard
creature.description: You see an amazoness coastguard. She protects the coasts of Amazon Island from intruders. She is not too happy to see you running in her island.

creature.name: amazoness coastguard mistress
creature.description: You see an amazoness coastguard mistress. Even if they are women, these blue haired mistresses should not be underestimated.

creature.name: amazoness commander
creature.description: You see an amazoness commander who is specialised in eliminating any strangers who dare to take a step to her island.

creature.name: amazoness elite coastguard
creature.description: You see an amazoness elite coastguard. When it is her shift to protect the island, you would just wish to have stayed at home.

creature.name: amazoness hunter
creature.description: You see an amazoness hunter. She creeps through the forest to hunt animals. But she doesn't like that you are in her hunting area!

creature.name: amazoness vigilance
creature.description: You see an amazoness vigilance. Her senses are well tuned, so you have to be very silent when you don't want her to hear you!

creature.name: amazoness imperator
creature.description: You see an amazoness imperator. She is the emperor of Amazon island and has ruled it for decades and won't let you get past her very easily.

creature.name: bandit
creature.description: You see a lean and mean bandit. He's out to get your life and purse!

creature.name: disciple assassin
creature.description: You see a disciple assassin. He is quite young but he has learned to fight and kill already.

noise.value: My dad can beat your dad.

creature.name: apprentice assassin
creature.description: You see an apprentice assassin. He has been taught some very awesome moves and methods, so he is already able to kill an enemy almost perfectly!

noise.value: You want a piece of me?

creature.name: assassin
creature.description: You see an assassin. He is very good at killing his victims silently without being seen by anyone.

creature.name: ninja
creature.description: Your keen eyes made you able to see this fast ninja. Prepare for a fight!

creature.name: shadows assassin
creature.description: You see a shadows assassin. He knows how to become one with the shadows and to move in the dark without being seen or making any sound.

creature.name: master assassin
creature.description: You see a master assassin. He is a master of assassination! He is able to kill an enemy without letting him know that he is already there!

creature.name: blordrough quartermaster
creature.description: You see a man who gave up his life as a puppet of the Blordrough army, all for the love of dragons. He is wonderfully happy.

noise.value: We might be in hiding, but we are STILL mighty.

creature.name: blordrough corporal
creature.description: You see a man who feels his past indicates how he should be treated now but desparately wishes to exercise his intelect in a game of chess.

noise.value: You WILL show us the respect we deserve.
Care for a game of chess?

creature.name: blordrough storm trooper
creature.description: You see a man who is but a fraction of his former glory as one of the most feared foes of Faiumoni. Now, his main concern is keeping his house clean and tidy.

noise.value: Wipe your feet before entering our domain.
I'll teach you to defile our sanctuary.

creature.name: cannibal woman
creature.description: You see a cannibal woman. She wants to make a soup out of your bones!

creature.name: cannibal
creature.description: You see a cannibal. He hunts you for cooking and eating your fresh meat! It's useless to tell him that your flesh is not good, better fight him or run away!

creature.name: chaos soldier
creature.description: You see a chaos soldier. Chaos soldiers are servants of the evil. Killing you is one of their evil plans.

creature.name: chaos warrior
creature.description: You see a chaos warrior. This chaotic creature is fighting with a big blade to slay his enemies.

creature.name: chaos commander
creature.description: You see a chaos commander who is working on an evil plan. You should take care of him before he fulfills his duty.

creature.name: chaos sorcerer
creature.description: You see a chaos sorcerer. Chaos sorcerers will cast some evil spells on you if you don't obey them.

noise.value: I will summon chaos and fury upon you!

creature.name: chaos dragonrider
creature.description: You see a chaos dragonrider. He is very well trained in dragon riding, but he can also fight well on the ground.

creature.name: chaos lord
creature.description: You see a chaos lord who is one of the strongest chaos creatures in Faiumoni. You should prepare well before attacking him.

creature.name: chaos overlord
creature.description: You see a chaos overlord. It is him who directs the creation of evil plans and gives orders to all chaotic creatures which exist.

noise.value: I am become death, destroyer of worlds.

creature.name: chaos pawn
creature.description: You see a pawn for a game of chess. He will drop nothing if you kill him.

creature.name: chaos rook
creature.description: You see a rook for a game of chess. He will drop nothing if you kill him.

creature.name: chaos knight
creature.description: You see a knight for a game of chess. He will drop nothing if you kill him.

creature.name: chaos bishop
creature.description: You see a bishop for a game of chess. He will not reward you if you kill him.

creature.name: chaos king
creature.description: You see a king of a game of chess. He will reward nothing if you kill him.

creature.name: chaos queen
creature.description: You see a queen piece for a game of chess. She will reward nothing if you kill her.

creature.name: imperial veteran
creature.description: You see an imperial veteran. He fought in many battles and wars. Now he is old, but over the years he always looked for a new enemy to fight against.

creature.name: imperial priest
creature.description: You see an imperial priest. The church has fallen out of favor with the citizens as of late, but this imperial priest still clings to the faith.

creature.name: imperial elite guardian
creature.description: You see an Imperial Elite Guardian. He is a very well trained guardian and he will protect his environment until the end.

creature.name: imperial scientist
creature.description: You see an imperial scientist. He is quite clever but also a little bit crazy and unfortunately he uses his intelligence for evil experiments.

creature.name: imperial high priest
creature.description: You see an imperial high priest who's troubled by the actions of the imperial science department. Be careful, he might take those frustrations out on you!

creature.name: imperial leader
creature.description: You see a well dressed imperial leader. It's troops will try to dash you.

creature.name: imperial general
creature.description: You see an imperial general with a huge scar above his eye. He is still strong, don't think that he will not see you!

creature.name: emperor dalmung
creature.description: You see an emperor dalmung who stands before you. Once a powerful warlock trained by a mighty magician, but he disappeared decades ago. Now it seems he's in league with Ivan Abe!

creature.name: kalavan housewife
creature.description: You see a kalavan housewife. She lives in Kalavan city and she very angry with rude people who want to steal her food out of the kitchen and destroy her beautiful flower garden!

creature.name: kalavan peasant
creature.description: You see a kalavan peasant. He works in the fields around Kalavan city. As he heard there were strangers in the city he came to help the kalavan citizens in fighting the enemies!

creature.name: kalavan wisewoman
creature.description: You see a kalavan wisewoman. Normally she sits in her small room and does some handworking but now she wants to have some action!

creature.name: kalavan citizen
creature.description: You see a kalavan citizen. He lives in kalavan city and tries to protect it from invaders!

creature.name: madaram pawn
creature.description: You see a pawn for a game of chess. It will reward nothing if killed.

creature.name: madaram rook
creature.description: You see a rook for a game of chess. It will scarcely reward you to kill it.

creature.name: madaram knight
creature.description: You see a knight, a chess piece. He won't reward you if you kill him.

creature.name: madaram bishop
creature.description: You see a bishop for a game of chess. It will reward you nothing if you slay it.

creature.name: madaram king
creature.description: You see a king to play chess with, he will reward you nothing if you kill him.

creature.name: madaram queen
creature.description: You see a queen piece for a game of chess. She will reward nothing if you kill her.

creature.name: mithrilbourgh general
creature.description: You see a mithrilbourgh general. Some call him Hawkeyes. He cast his gaze over the city walls and saw you coming from miles away.

creature.name: monk
creature.description: You see a monk. Monks are very calm and peaceful. They live alone among themselves, but they don't want to be interrupted by anyone.

noise.value: The end of the world is nigh...

creature.name: darkmonk
creature.description: You see a Darkmonk. Darkmonks can control dark powers, and they will do anything to get you out of their way!

creature.name: devil monk
creature.description: You see a devil monk. He is a member of a devil cult which practises black rituals.

creature.name: risecia thug
creature.description: You see a risecia thug, stay away from him!

creature.name: risecia archer
creature.description: You see a risecia archer, just one of the warriors who wants to protect his chief.

creature.name: risecia swordsman
creature.description: You see a risecia swordsman, the blade of his sword will cut your head!

creature.name: Chief Falatheen of the Risecia
creature.description: You see the Chief Falatheen of the Risecia, he doesn't want to die! His little warriors protect him against invaders.

creature.name: littlewitch
creature.description: You see a little witch. Witches are are evil little girls who are very dangerous.

creature.name: littlewizard
creature.description: You see a little wizard. Although he is a child, he is already able to cast powerful spells.
